title: API Key Authentication Middleware Config
description: Configuration for the API key authentication middleware plugin

key_location.description: Where to extract the API key from

header_name.description: Header name to extract the key from (when key_location is 'header')

query_param.description: Query parameter name to extract the key from (when key_location is 'query')

keys.description: Map of valid API keys to their metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for this key (for logging/auditing)

scopes.description: Optional scopes/permissions associated with this key
